Prev: Strahov View Up: Pražský Hrad Next: Loretánská I

Malý Buddha



In the door to the right of this sign is a charming and inexpensive Buddhist restaurant, in which I had ginger green tea and a calamari salad. One of my favorite restaurants from the whole trip.
Taken Saturday, July 07, 2007, 01:34:41PM. Original image size: 2048x3072, 1.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/4000s @ F4.0, ISO 100, 50mm/F1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS CS2 5000:5, 0.5:10:50:25:0, USM 10:20
